DOC.brief_summary: This open , prospective , control , randomize , comparative study 2 arm . The purpose study assess efficacy osteopathy breast surgery . 80 patient enrol , 40 per arm . Patients randomized inclusion follow one year .
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Evaluation Osteopathy Treatment Efficacy Pain Support After Breast Surgery Oncology
DOC.criteria: woman > = 18 year pain ( median VAS > =3 week prior inclusion ) mastectomy tumorectomy axillary dissection < = 12 month PS < =2 able write , understand read French sign informed consent pain immediate breast reconstruction history cognitive psychiatric trouble
